-- -- ---------------------------- Check whether Local Input Folder Files Present------------------------

Function Divide(num)
  div=split(num,",")
  Divide=div(0)/div(1)
  
end Function

Function Remainder(num)
  div=split(num,",")
  Divide=div(0) mod div(1)
  
end Function
